name: V.S. Whitty Full Week (TheMightyMuffin69)
description:
I am NOT the creator of this mod, I'm just reuploading the mod on the behalf of the creator. The reupload is the latest version of the mod before deletion. P.S, the program is only for Windows. If you're a mac user, use Wineskin to play the mod. And i'm NOT accepting donations, because I DO NOT want to make money out of a mod that wasn't made by me. The video of the trailer was deleted and I am NOT sure if I can restore it. P.S, To all the Twitter crybabies... DON'T GET BLOCKED! :D

Credits:

Sock.clip (Artist and Song Composer)

Nate Anim8 (Note Charter, Secondary Animator and Play Tester)

KadeDev (Coder)

bbpanzu (Secondary Coder)
